frameDefinitions: A Cognizer has carried out an approximate calculation or considered some Evidence and produced an approximation of the Value of a feature of an Item.
A Communicator or Medium assigns linguistic meaning to an Unresolved_referent thereby identifying the specific actor or entity which fulfills the answer to this question.
A Figure is (stably) located with respect to a Ground in terms of how the distance between them compares to some general or contextually relevant scale.
This frame contains verbs and nouns that communicate the act of a Speaker to address a Message to some Addressee using language.
A Cognizer calls up an episodic memory of past Experience or an Impression of a Salient_entity formed  on the basis of past experience.
A Speaker mentions a Specified_entity filling a Role, thereby providing information which supports a point of the Speaker.
frameExamples: You can list a <t><fex name='Value'>ballpark figure</fex></t> for shipping and handling.
Can you <t>name</t> all the U.S. Presidents?
I now <t>declare</t> you members of this Society.
Kozmo could <t>remember</t> when his modem was the fastest he could buy.
He cites the chief original observations <t>adduced</t> by Darwin as evidence for his theory.
listRoleDefinitions: The individual who has considered evidence or performed calculations to produce the approximation.
The position or area  on the feature scale that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has concluded the <fen>Item</fen> occupies.
The entity that possesses a feature whose <fen>Value</fen> the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has approximated.
A proposition expressing the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s approximation of a feature's <fen>Value</fen>.
An open proposition for which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has approximated the <fen>Value</fen> of a variable.
The time period during which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> formed the estimate.
The location in which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has formed their estimate.
The person who uses language in the written or spoken modality to convey the <fen>Unresolved_referent</fen> to another person.
The thing to which the <fen>Communicator</fen> or <fen>Medium</fen> refers for identification purposes.
The physical or abstract setting in which the <fen>Unresolved_referent</fen> is conveyed.
When the the <fen>Communicator</fen> is makes the indication.
The location where the <fen>Communicator</fen> or <fen>Medium</fen> indicates the <fen>Unresolved_referent</fen>.
The <fen>Ground</fen> serves as a basis for describing the location of the <fen>Figure</fen>.
The <fen>Figure</fen> is perceived as located relative to a certain <fen>Ground</fen> location. The figure can be an entity or an event.
The period of time during which the locative relation between <fen>Figure</fen> and <fen>Ground</fen> obtains.

The <fen>Speaker</fen> is the sentient entity that produces the <fen>Message</fen> (whether spoken or written).  It is normally expressed as the External Argument of predicative uses of the <t>target	</t> word, or as the Genitive modifier of the noun.
The <fen>Message</fen> is the role that identifies the content of what the <fen>Speaker</fen> is communicating to the <fen>Addressee</fen>.  It can be expressed as a clause or as a noun phrase.
The <fen>Topic</fen> is the subject matter to which the <fen>Message</fen> pertains. It is normally expressed as a PP Complement headed by 'about', but in some cases it can appear as a direct object.
<fen>Medium</fen> is the physical entity or channel used by the <fen>Speaker</fen> to transmit the statement.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Message</fen> is made.
The role specifies the location where the <fen>Message</fen> takes place.
A person who recalls memories of past experience or impressions.
A person or thing that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers as being involved in some state or event or as having some property.
A past event or state that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> witnessed and is now recalling. The <fen>Experience</fen> may be a specific event or state or a vaguer period that is treated as a unit.

A property that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> attributes to the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> based on their past experience of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> or a category to which the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is assigned.
A property or role that a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> actually held and which frames the memories that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers the experience.
The <fen>Speaker</fen> is the person who specifies the <fen>Role</fen> to be filled by the <fen>Specified_entity</fen>.
<fen>Medium</fen> is the physical entity or channel used by the <fen>Speaker</fen> to transmit the statement.
The entity that the <fen>Speaker</fen> identifies as filling a particular <fen>Role</fen>.
A slot in a particular or generic event or relation whose filler the <fen>Speaker</fen> identifies.
The time when the statement is made.
The role specifies the place where the statement takes place.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Her</fex> estimation was that they had exported up to 180000 fish.
Sotheby 's estimate of its value was <fex>$10m-$14m</fex>.
He's an engineer and he is supposed to know the estimate <fex>of the house</fex>.
One estimate was <fex>that eventually I had lost about 80% of my blood</fex>.

Galliard decided Rwanda was different, and he went public with his estimate
<fex>of how many people had been killed in a matter of two weeks</fex>.
That is 30000 higher than <fex>last year's</fex> estimate of 2.65 million
<fex>When this is resolved</fex>, I will name the winner.
The cat is near <fex>the mat</fex>.
<fex>The cat</fex> is near the mat.
He was near Athens <fex>on Friday</fex>.
<fex>Evelyn</fex> spoke feelingly about what happened.
Evelyn said <fex>that she was not ready to leave</fex>.
Evelyn spoke candidly <fex>about her past</fex>.
Kim preached to me <fex>over the phone</fex>.
In some remarks <fex>at the National Press Club</fex>, Mr. Keating said he would make a better prime minister tha nMr. Hawke.
I will truly miss Delmar and <fex>I</fex> will always remember when his eyes lit up everytime he got ice-cream.
today I saw a sister's exclassmate, and didn't recognise him, I remember <fex>him</fex> taller.
I can still remember <fex>saying the pledge every morning before class in elementary school</fex>, a rare occurrence among elementary school kids nowadays.
I remember Peter <fex>as immensely kind in those first three weeks before I was packed off to boarding school</fex>.
Atulprasad is principally remembered <fex>as a musician and composer</fex>.
I 'll <fex>never</fex> forget being in hospital
But<fex>Arturo Boncato Jr., marketing manager of the Marco Polo Hotel,</fex> cited the high occupancy rates in the hotels as proof of increasing visitors' confidence.
<fex>In a subsequent paper</fex> he adduced further evidence.

Reilly pointed <fex>to the high labor costs</fex> as the
main reason for the decision to close down the New Orleans facility.
TCI named the overly expensive bid price <fex>as the main reason for their strict opposition against a merger</fex>.

Persistent, heavy rainfall and poorly maintained drainage systems were cited
<fex>yesterday</fex> as the prime causes for the rising floodwaters
<fex>In Kuala Lumpur</fex>, he also pointed to the accountability/assessment arena as a place for new businesses to investigate.
